CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The J-V characteristics are shown in Figure 6a and the parameters of J sc , V oc , FF and PCE of the resulting PSCs are summarized in Table 2.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| J-V |
| J sc |
| V oc |
| FF |
| PCE |

Note:

* J-V refers to the J-V characteristics, which is a term used to describe the relationship between the current (J) and voltage (V) of a photovoltaic device.
* J sc, V oc, FF, and PCE are all parameters that are used to describe the performance of a photovoltaic device, specifically, the short-circuit current (J sc), open-circuit voltage (V oc), fill factor (FF), and power conversion efficiency (PCE).

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| J sc |
| V oc |

The following entities do not clearly refer to "Material name" and were removed:

* J-V (referring to the J-V characteristics, not a material name)
* FF (referring to the fill factor, not a material name)
* PCE (referring to the power conversion efficiency, not a material name)
